ChapterInformation.summary: NOTE Experimental The ChapterInformation interface of the {{domxref("Media Session API", "", "", "nocode")}} represents the metadata for an individual chapter of a media resource (i.e., a video or audio file).

remarks.para: The chapter information for a given media resource is set when it is first created, via the chapterInfo property of the constructor's initialization object. The property takes an array of ChapterInformation objects as its value.
You can access the chapter information for an existing object via its property. This returns an array of ChapterInformation objects.

ChapterInformationArtwork.summary:
NOTE Experimental The artwork read-only property of the
interface returns an {{jsxref("Array")}} of objects representing images associated with the chapter.
ChapterInformationArtwork.value: An of objects. Each object contains the following properties:

ChapterInformationStartTime.summary:
NOTE Experimental The startTime read-only property of the
interface returns a number representing the start time of the chapter in seconds.

ChapterInformationTitle.summary:
NOTE Experimental The title read-only property of the
interface returns a string representing the title of the chapter.
